changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.meta_protocol ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Unique identifier service bigint NOT NULL, -- The Event we are creating a mask for sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL, -- Ordering and uniqueness, for when an Event can have multiple meta-protocol rules requesting_resource bigint, -- Used to select a mapped value for the requesting resource service_type bigint, -- Used to select a mapped value for the service type product_ordered bigint, -- Used to select a mapped value for the product ordered job_mapping bigint, -- Used to select a mapped value from a Job deliver_to bigint, -- Used to select a mapped value for the location to deliver to deliver_from bigint, -- Used to select a mapped value for the location to deliver from stop_on_match boolean DEFAULT FALSE, -- Indicates no further meta protocol transformations should be processed notes character varying, -- Additional notes regarding usage of the meta protocol research bigint, -- Indicates that a rule needs to be researched or investigated to resolve a potential problem updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The Resource that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The date this rule was last changed CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_service_type_fkey FOREIGN KEY (service_type) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_requesting_resource_fkey FOREIGN KEY (requesting_resource) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_product_ordered_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product_ordered) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_service_fkey FOREIGN KEY (service) REFERENCES ruleform.entity (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_job_mapping_fkey FOREIGN KEY (job_mapping) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_deliver_to_fkey FOREIGN KEY (deliver_to) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_deliver_from_fkey FOREIGN KEY (deliver_from) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT meta_protocol_service_sequence_number_key UNIQUE (service , sequence_number ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.meta_protocol IS 'Rules for generating masks for the protocol ruleform'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.meta_protocol.id IS 'Unique identifier'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.meta_protocol.service IS 'The Event we are creating a mask for'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.meta_protocol.sequence_number IS 'Ordering and uniqueness, for when an Event can have multiple meta-protocol rules'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.meta_protocol.service_type IS 'Used to select a mapped value from a Entity'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.meta_protocol.product_ordered IS 'Used to select a mapped value from a Entity'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.meta_protocol.job_mapping IS 'Used to select a mapped value from a Job'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.meta_protocol.notes IS 'Additional notes regarding usage of the attribute'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.meta_protocol.research IS 'Indicates that a rule needs to be researched or investigated to resolve a potential problem'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.meta_protocol.updated_by IS 'The Resource that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.meta_protocol.update_date IS 'The date this rule was last changed';
